meanings.definition: A food or food product that provides health benefits in addition to basic nutrition.
meanings.sent1: My doctor recommended incorporating nutraceuticals like fortified cereals into my diet for better health.
meanings.sent2: Many people take nutraceuticals like vitamin-enriched juices to boost their well-being.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally mistook the nutraceutical bar for a regular snack, but at least I got some extra nutrients!
meanings.sent4: The nutraceutical industry is like a treasure trove of health-enhancing foods waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: Eating nutraceuticals is like giving your body a daily dose of goodness to stay strong and healthy.

meanings.definition: A dietary supplement that is derived from food sources and has extra health benefits.
meanings.sent1: My grandmother takes nutraceuticals like fish oil capsules to support her heart health.
meanings.sent2: Athletes often rely on nutraceuticals like protein powders to aid in muscle recovery.
meanings.sent3: I joked that the nutraceutical pills were like magic beans that promised vitality in a bottle.
meanings.sent4: In a world full of artificial supplements, nutraceuticals stand out as nature's gift for well-being.
meanings.sent5: The benefits of nutraceuticals are like a secret weapon for those seeking an extra boost in their health journey.
